definition: first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°
sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

pinyin: dui4 qiang3 ji1 ben3 jia3 suan1 zhi3

sentences.english: No parabens, aluminum, propylene glycol, synthetic fragrances or harsh preservatives.
sentences.chinese: 沒有苯甲酸酯，鋁，丙二醇，合成香料或防腐劑苛刻。

sentences.english: Relationship between photocatalytic degradation of benzoic acids and reaction with hydroxyl radical.
sentences.chinese: 苯甲酸類光催化降解和羥基自由基反應的關係。

sentences.english: Why should the MBA be added as the internal standard in the test?
sentences.chinese: 實驗中添加內標物鄰甲基苯甲酸的目的是什麼？

sentences.english: FREE of Dyes, Perfume, Lanolin, Parabens and Formaldehyde.
sentences.chinese: 不含染料，香水，羊毛脂，對羥基苯甲酸酯和甲醛。

sentences.english: The antibacterial activity of sesamin was remarkable compared with sodium benzoate at the same concentration.
sentences.chinese: 芝麻素的抗菌作用優於同濃度的苯甲酸鈉。

sentences.english: The content ofp hydroxybenzoic acid in sawdust is the highest, followed by that ofp coumaric acid.
sentences.chinese: 木屑中對羥基苯甲酸含量最高，香豆酸次之。

sentences.english: No parabens, harsh preservatives or grapefruit seed extract.
sentences.chinese: 沒有苯甲酸酯，苛刻的防腐劑或葡萄柚籽提取物。

sentences.english: It was originally obtained by decarboxylation of benzoic acid.
sentences.chinese: 它最先是由苯甲酸脫羧而得到的。

sentences.english: The univalent radical derived from benzoic acid.
sentences.chinese: 從苯甲酸衍生而來的一價化學基。

sentences.english: The fluorescence of tryptophan residue in BSA was quenched by benzoate.
sentences.chinese: 白蛋白中色氨酸殘基的熒光被苯甲酸鈉淬滅。

sentences.english: The method was used to determine salicylic acid in benzoic acid.
sentences.chinese: 該法巳用於樣品複方苯甲酸醇溶液中水楊酸的測定。

sentences.english: The method may determine the content of sodium benzoate in inosine injection at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 本法還可測定注射液中苯甲酸鈉的含量。

sentences.english: Compound benzoic acid ointment is used in the treatment of fungal infections of the skin.
sentences.chinese: 複合苯甲酸痠軟膏被使用在皮膚的真菌感染的治療。

sentences.english: Synthesis of Chiral Unnatural Amino Acids by Friedel-Crafts Reaction;
sentences.chinese: 這個複合反應是被鄰氨基苯甲酸合成酶催化的。

sentences.english: Liquid-phase oxidation of toluene by air is an environment friendly technology to produce benzoic acid.
sentences.chinese: 甲苯液相空氣氧化是環境友好的苯甲酸生產工藝。

sentences.english: Synthesized the useful reversible addition-fragmentation transfer(RAFT) agent dithiobenzoic acid.
sentences.chinese: 合成了重要的RAFT聚合鏈轉移劑二硫代苯甲酸。

definition: to detect/to examine and discover/to sense

pinyin: guo4 yang3 hua4 ben3 jia3 xian1
